attributes.action: GIVE ME PRIVATE E-MAIL FOR CONFIDENTIAL GOVERNMENT MATTERS:
attributes.additional_details:
PLEASE GIVE ME PRIME MINISTER PRIVATE E-MAIL ADDRESS SO THAT I CAN SEND HIM SOME CONFIDENTIAL COPIES OF E-MAILS.

I HAVE SOME COPIES OF E-MAILS I WOULD LIKE TO SEND TO HIM.

REGARDS.


REV. JAMES K.N. GITAU
38 TONBRIDGE HOUSE
50 PENGE ROAD
SOUTH NORWOOD
LONDON SE25 4EU

MOBILE: 07711936139

E- MAIL: gitaujimmie@yahoo.co.uk

rejection.details: You can email the Prime Ministers Office through the Downing Street website - www.pm.gov.uk
